main event: A witness reported seeing a large, circular, disk-shaped object with a dome on top that was hovering and giving off a brilliant white light in the sky near Nelsonville, Ohio on May 24, 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared to be around 200-300 feet in diameter.
The object began moving slowly in a northeasterly direction, then suddenly accelerated to an unbelievable speed and disappeared from sight.
The witness was convinced that they saw an unidentified flying object.
Another witness reported seeing a similar object that hovered motionless over a bean picker field before moving off slowly.
The Air Force requested the witness complete a detailed questionnaire to further investigate the sighting.
sighted object: large, circular, disk-shaped object with a dome on top
location: Nelsonville, Ohio; Daviess County, Illinois-Iowa area
witnesses: multiple witnesses, including a man working in a bean picker field
photographs: no photographs present in the report
